benefits.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits.item1_description: Book any service in minutes with a tap.
benefits.item2_description: All providers are verified and reliable.
benefits.item3_description: Everything you need in one app.

about.title: Bel-Khedma – Connecting the Community with Exceptional Services
about.description: At the heart of Madinah, BalKhedma offers a platform that brings together volunteers and users to provide delivery services, guided tours, and transportation with ease and convenience.

join.title: Join Us!
join.description: Whether you are a user in need of a service or a volunteer eager to give back, join our community and be part of a positive change.

loginPage.title: Welcome to Our community
loginPage.passwordPattern: Minimum eight characters, at least one letter and one number

registerPage.title: Welcome to Our Project
registerPage.name: Full Name
registerPage.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again
registerPage.nameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters
registerPage.nameMax: Name must be less than 40 characters
registerPage.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
registerPage.passwordPattern: Password must be 10 to 15 characters long and include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character
